channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Blueprint for Ukrainian Surrender
item.description: The draft proposal represents a betrayal for Ukraine and a humiliation for the West.

item.title: Wall Street is on tenterhooks over the Fed’s ‘rare, genuinely suspenseful’ December meeting—the committee is unsure of the data, and each other
item.description: A divided Fed meets amid mixed jobs and inflation signals, leaving Powell with a suspenseful December.

item.title: Trump’s Terrorist Designation of Muslim Brotherhood Sends Right Message
item.description: Though it isn’t a sweeping designation for the entire organization, the administration has taken a good first step.

item.title: Deloitte just got caught again citing fabricated and AI-generated research—this time in a million-dollar report for the Canadian government

item.title: Ken Burns Is Completely Wrong About the Iroquois
item.description: The Iroquois confederation wasn’t even a democracy. Leaders were selected by women elders, whose status was hereditary.
